title: Onboard a New Carrier
description: A logistics company is adding a new trucking company to its network. A compliance specialist must set them up in the system.

tasks.description: Create a new carrier profile with their name, address, and DOT number.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new carrier record is created.

tasks.description: Upload the carrier's contract, W-9 form, and insurance certificate.
tasks.expected_outcome: All required compliance documents are uploaded to the carrier's profile.

tasks.description: Enter the carrier's rate tariff for various lanes into the rating system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The carrier's rates are now available for quoting.

tasks.description: Activate the carrier, making them eligible to be selected for shipments.
tasks.expected_outcome: The carrier is now active in the TMS.
